column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Parbeloix is in search of someone skilled with a weapon.
Consult the illustration to find and obtain sample 316.
Deliver sample 316 to Parbeloix.

<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Sir</If>, I say, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Sir</If>. I seem to be in a bit of a bind, and I was wondering if you might lend your aid to remedy the plight of a struggling student.
Oh, of course─introductions. I am Parbeloix, from the Studium, where my research involves the finer points of bacteria and fungi.
I'm here to harvest mushrooms from Labyrinthos for my experiments, but I'm afraid I may be in over my head.
You see, the mushrooms are located in the thirty-third facet, but that shaft is positively swarming with things I can scarce stand to look at, let alone face in combat.
It isn't uncommon for members of the Studium to request help from the more martially inclined, and so here I am before you. Will you procure the mushrooms for me? I would be forever in your debt.

Oh, thank you, good <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>! Well then, the sample number for my plot is three-one-six. The mushrooms stand out among the others, with red caps and a distinctive triangle shape.
Just in case, however, I do have this illustration. I understand all too well the impulse to become lost gazing at the fungi─perhaps this will help keep you on track.
If you find the sheer variety of mushrooms to be overwhelming, then simply consult the picture and it should put you back on track.
Please return with the crop labeled sample three-one-six. If you forget how they look, simply consult the illustration I gave you and resume the merry harvest.
These don't appear to be the correct mushrooms, although they do have a certain charm...
This appears to be an illustration of sample 316. Find the matching mushrooms within the vast thirty-third facet.
These mushrooms match the illustration in your hands. Your long search is over!
Well, I can see by the dirt on your boots that you did some manner of digging. Were you able to find my sample?
Ah, yes, these match my illustration exactly! Thank the Twelve that the brave of heart still walk this realm.
Do you have an interest in fungi yourself? These were developed from the spores of the elfstool, which can only be found in the Aurum Vale. A rare mushroom, but these are superior in every way.
For one, they are much less inclined to kill you. A vast improvement by any measure of the word.
Of course, I've had my failures, but the less said about those the better. What matters is now, and the revolution sample three-one-six is sure to herald!
A picture of sample 316.
